markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dark Naga](/Monsters.aspx?ID=306)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Dark nagas are wicked, jealous creatures that crave power and wealth. Indeed, the dark naga sees such ideals as spiritual expressions of an essential truth: if one can take something, that something is theirs to have. The dark naga sees other creatures as lessers worthy only of subjugation or as rivals who must be eliminated.

 Dark nagas dwell in remote places other creatures have forsaken, searching abandoned ruins for wealth and potent magic items. Those unlucky trespassers into a dark naga’s lair typically find themselves as the naga’s slaves or playthings, put to sleep with the monster’s poison or incinerated by its deadly magic. Some dark nagas are more disposed toward socializing than others; in these cases, they may become wicked despots who rule over enclaves of captive or unsuspecting subjects. Subtler dark nagas, especially those who crave finer luxuries, dwell in or under the wealthy settlements and use their wiles to garner a decadent following, forming something akin to a cult with the naga as the jewelry-bedecked object of worship.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Naga_DarkNaga.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Dark Naga](/Monsters.aspx?ID=306)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 242</row>

**Perception** +15; [_mind reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) 30 feet, darkvision

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +15 

guarded thoughts
</row>

**HP** 115

**Guarded Thoughts** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Dark nagas are immune to any form of mind reading.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d8+5 piercing plus dark naga venom

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 26, attack +18
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160), [Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Illusory Creature](/Spells.aspx?ID=158), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (3 slots)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 25
- **Constant (3rd)**
[Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194)

**Dark Naga Venom**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 5 minutes; **Stage 1** [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 round); **Stage 2** [slowed 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 round); **Stage 3** unconscious with no Perception check to wake up (1d4+1 minutes)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-75" />
name: Dark Naga
